tool_description: A stateless, light-weight remote procedure call (RPC) API. It uses JSON (RFC 4627) as data format.
name: Ethereum RPC
title: Ethereum RPC

api_list.name: Ethereum Mainnet RPC
api_list.description: Ethereum Mainnet is the largest Ethereum Virtual Machine (EVM) network to date.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-rpc2.p.rapidapi.com/9aa3d95b3bc440fa88ea12eaa4456161"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "ethereum-rpc2.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://ethereum-rpc2.p.rapidapi.com/9aa3d95b3bc440fa88ea12eaa4456161"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",

print(response.json())
